title: Belém confirmed as Amazon COP30 host
description:
The United Nations Climate Change Conference on Monday elected Brazil as the host for the 2025 edition. During a speech in Dubai, Environment Minister Marina Silva thanked member states for endorsing Brazil’s bid and confirmed her government’s plan to host COP30 in Belém, the second-largest city in Brazil’s Amazon region and the capital of Pará […]

The post Belém confirmed as Amazon COP30 host  appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Norway makes new pledge to Amazon Fund
description:
Norway on Monday announced an additional USD 50 million donation to the Amazon Fund, which finances conservation efforts in the rainforest. This is Norway’s first new donation since 2018. Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Støre said in a statement that “a 50 percent reduction in deforestation in the Amazon by 2023” is a result of President […]

The post Norway makes new pledge to Amazon Fund appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
